00033 
00034 bool CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateAuto(CStdImage& Source,CStdImage& Dest,
00035                                                                                           double Sx, double Sy, double phi,UINT32 Background)
00036 {
00037 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00038         /* add comment to history */
00039         TString History;
00040         k_InitString(&History);
00041         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateAuto(Sx=%g,Sy=%g,phi=%g,Background=%d)",
00042                 ipl_HistoryIndent,Sx,Sy,phi,Background);
00043         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00044         k_EmptyString(&History);
00045         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00046 #endif
00047         /* call kernel function */
00048         bool ReturnValue=k_ScaleAndRotateAuto(Source.GetTImagePtr(),Dest.GetTImagePtr(),Sx,Sy,phi,Background);
00049         if (ReturnValue==false)
00050         {
00051                 ostringstream ost;
00052                 ost << "CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateAuto() Failed scaling/rotating" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00053                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00054         }
00055 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00056         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00057         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00058         /* remove the history line added to source above */
00059         if (&Source!=&Dest)
00060                 Source.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00061 #endif
00062         return ReturnValue;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateFixed(CStdImage& Source,CStdImage& Dest,double x0,double y0,
00066                                                    int Width,int Height,double Sx, double Sy, double phi,UINT32 Background)
00067 {
00068 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00069         /* add comment to history */
00070         TString History;
00071         k_InitString(&History);
00072         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateFixed(x0=%g,y0=%g,Width=%d,Height=%d,Sx=%g,Sy=%g,phi=%g,Background=%d)",
00073                 ipl_HistoryIndent,x0,y0,Width,Height,Sx,Sy,phi,Background);
00074         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00075         k_EmptyString(&History);
00076         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00077 #endif
00078         /* call kernel function */
00079         bool ReturnValue=k_ScaleAndRotateFixed(Source.GetTImagePtr(),Dest.GetTImagePtr(),x0,y0,
00080                                                    Width,Height,Sx,Sy,phi,Background);
00081         if (ReturnValue==false)
00082         {
00083                 ostringstream ost;
00084                 ost << "CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAndRotateFixed() Failed scaling/rotating" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00085                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00086         }
00087 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00088         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00089         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00090         /* remove the history line added to source above */
00091         if (&Source!=&Dest)
00092                 Source.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00093 #endif
00094         return ReturnValue;
00095 }

00097 bool CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAuto(CStdImage& Source,CStdImage& Dest,
00098                                                                          double Sx, double Sy, UINT32 Background)
00099 {

00106         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00107         k_EmptyString(&History);
00108         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00109 #endif
00110         /* call kernel function */
00111         bool ReturnValue=k_ScaleAuto(Source.GetTImagePtr(),Dest.GetTImagePtr(),Sx,Sy,Background);
00112         if (ReturnValue==false)
00113         {
00114                 ostringstream ost;
00115                 ost << "CCoordinateTransform::ScaleAuto() Failed scaling" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00116                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());

00121         /* remove the history line added to source above */

00143         if (ReturnValue==false)
00144         {
